page.title: 07Recreation in Southam
page.content: The most popular leisure time activity is undoubtedly watching T.V. and videos (for both adults and children). For adults this is followed by D.I.Y. (jobs around the home) and gardening. Teenagers also watch many hours of T.V. a week. They form the biggest group of people regularly visiting the pub for a drink. They also enjoy dancing, chatting and drinking at discos. These are often held at Southam's Community Centre. Children's main interests are T.V., playing out on bikes, sport, especially football and swimming, roller skating, horse riding and listening to pop music. Many belong to the cubs, brownies etc. and enjoy the activities these offer. There has been an increase in the number of home computers and playing computer games is very popular.
